message.name: ERR_FV_REFERENCE_EXISTS
message.locale: A good cause with the reference specified already exists. Good cause reference must be unique.

message.name: ERR_FV_NAME_BLANK
message.locale: The name must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_FV_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: A good cause with the name specified already exists. Good cause name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_FV_RECORD_CANCELED
message.locale: This good cause has already been canceled.
This good cause has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FV_RECORD_CANCELED_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: This good cause is cancelled and cannot be modified.
This good cause is canceled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ASSIGNED_TO_PLANITEM
message.locale: This good cause is assigned to at least one plan item and cannot be cancelled.
This good cause is assigned to at least one plan item and cannot be canceled.

message.name: ERR_GOODCAUSE_XRV_ASSIGNED_TO_REFERENCE
message.locale: This good cause is assigned to at least one %1c and cannot be deleted.
